mapper.select: SELECT day FROM event_time WHERE event_no = #{event_no} AND (open_time IS NULL AND close_time IS NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reserve (event_no, member_no, reserve_date, reserve_time) VALUES (#{event_no}, #{member_no}, #{reserve_date}, #{reserve_time})
mapper.delete: delete from reserve where event_no = #{event_no} and member_no = #{member_no} AND reserve_date=#{reserve_date} AND reserve_time=#{reserve_time}
